= 助手、行为插件、用户界面控件的命名方式 =


|| *类型* || *类名称* || *对应文件名* ||
|| 控制器助手 || Controller_Helper_Control || controller/helper/control.php ||
|| 一般助手 || Helper_Array || helper/array.php ||
|| 行为插件 || Model_Behavior_Tree || model/behavior/tree.php ||
|| 用户界面控件 || Control_Pagination || control/pagination.php ||
|| 用户界面控件模板 || 无 || view/_controls/pagination_control.php ||
|| 用户界面元素 || 无 || view/_elements/header_element.php ||
